attributes.review: When I opened the app it immediately killed my cat who was sitting right next to me, so I obviously started to cry and the app made fun of me and called me a cry baby. So I showed it to my mom and she instantly started crying out of fear from seeing what she described as a Cheeto with a face so I have no option but to delete it. I would not recommend this app😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡😡🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: Death

attributes.review: IT KILLED MY MOM. my mom downloaded the app because she loved our president trump🇺🇸 but, after she downloaded it it would send her notifications every time she was driving. the notifications wouldn’t stop so she had to turn her silence her phone. this resulted in her running a red light and getting hit by on oncoming vehicle. RIP mom👩🏽💕
attributes.title: absolutely awful

attributes.review: I am truly in shock with this app I wanted to be an Oompa Loompa as the reviews I saw stated but instead I turned into a man with a horrible spray tan and i look like a baby carrot almost like the president I want to go back to my normal self or even better as a Oompa loompa but this made me nowhere close to that I feel offended and I appreciate if this app gets taken down sincerely little dude xoxo gossip dude 😘piece

attributes.review: Downloaded this app to support my president and two days later began to show COVID-19 like symptoms. I’m afraid this app is a trap created by the Trump administration to expand the cases of Corona virus in the United States. By downloading this app, Trump is able to infect more innocent people with the virus which is a technique to reduce the population. My life is now on the line. Unless you want to catch the corona virus and die, DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!
attributes.title: Terrible app😡😡

attributes.review: The second I opened the app my phone glitched up and hundreds of my photos were deleted. I am infuriated and disgusted that the president allowed this. I suspect that someone is hacking our phones through the app. Warning!!!! Do not download unless you want to loose photo! I am disgusted and will never download again
attributes.title: Absolutely terrible - I lost photos

attributes.review: horrible app.  when u open the app it smells bad. there’s also a very orange racist person that isn’t very pleasing to look at. think it’s name is bunker boy but 🤷🏽‍♀️ he also got mad at generation z bc we’re elite and when all these old people go bye bye the world will b a better place😌 but anyways the app is HORRIBLE and so is bunker boy.
attributes.title: if u want to leave a review u have to download it first😒

attributes.review: As a black person, this app said the n-word  and it hacked all the TVs in my house and told me to “go to Africa” VERY RACIST l. This app told me I am a ... “monkey” I don’t know how it knew I was black but I will never support again. A few hours later the government came to my house and burned it down, and said it was an “accident” even though u could see gas and matches in their hands. NEVER SUPPORTING AGAIN.
attributes.title: RACIST APP

attributes.review: i hate this app!! i tried to support the president like a good American and i downloaded this to try and show my support and it shut off my phone and made fumes come out of it!! what the heck is that!! i would like to talk to the person who created this app! ✨🧚u guys rly killed it with this app🧚‍♂️🌸✨now leave it dead☀️🌻🌈🧚
attributes.title: literally broke my phone for 20 mins!!!!!

attributes.review: I decided to download this app because i’ve been supporting trump since 2016 and wanted to keep up with what’s going on. As soon as i opened the app and saw cheetoboybunkerboi i felt as if i couldn’t breathe and started seizing. I am now at the hospital and am deleting this horrible app. I hope other do not make the same mistake i did, DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!
attributes.title: this app gave me a seizure

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to show my undying love and support... I feel like this failed. It’s not a GREAT App. It’s Not The Greatest App On The AppleStore. I feel like it’s misrepresented of what this app really is. Has a lot problems to fix. Apple you should let this app go. I hoped for something 

Better.. 
Lost hope in this app pretty quick.
Moral is that this app is bad.
attributes.title: Highly Unsatisfied
